remedies.name: Ajwain Water
remedies.description: Relieves bloating by improving digestion and reducing gas.
steps: Measure 1 tsp ajwain seeds and check for impurities.
In a small saucepan, bring 1 cup of water to a boil.
Add the ajwain seeds to the boiling water.
Reduce the heat and let it simmer gently for 2-3 minutes to extract the oils.
Turn off the heat, cover the pan, and let it steep for another 2 minutes.
Strain the water into a cup using a fine mesh sieve.
Add black salt if desired and stir well.
Allow to cool slightly until warm (not hot) before drinking.
Sip slowly, preferably after meals for best results.

remedies.name: Fennel Tea
remedies.description: Reduces bloating and calms the digestive tract.
ingredients: Optional: ginger, honey, or cinnamon stick
steps: Lightly crush the fennel seeds with a mortar and pestle to release their oils.
Bring 1.5 cups of water to a boil in a small pot.
Add the fennel seeds (and ginger if using) to the boiling water.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 5-7 minutes.
Turn off the heat, add a cinnamon stick if desired, and let steep for 2 more minutes.
Strain the tea into a cup using a fine mesh strainer.
If sweetening, add honey only when the tea has cooled slightly.
Drink 20 minutes before meals or whenever experiencing bloating.
Chew the leftover fennel seeds for additional digestive support.

remedies.name: Triphala Powder
remedies.description: Supports digestion and relieves chronic bloating.
steps: Boil water and let it cool for 2-3 minutes until warm but not hot.
Place the triphala powder in a small bowl.
Add a tablespoon of warm water to the powder and mix into a paste.
Gradually add the remaining water while stirring continuously to prevent clumping.
Drink immediately before the mixture settles.
For first-time users, start with 1/4 tsp and gradually increase to 1/2 tsp over a week.
Best consumed on an empty stomach before bedtime for gentle overnight cleansing.
Rinse mouth after drinking as triphala can temporarily stain teeth.

remedies.name: Ginger Elixir
remedies.description: Boosts metabolism and alleviates gas and bloating.
steps: Wash and scrub the ginger root thoroughly.
Grate the ginger using a fine grater or microplane.
Add the grated ginger and 2 cups of water to a saucepan.
Bring to a gentle boil over medium heat.
Once boiling, reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 5 minutes.
Strain the liquid into a cup using a fine mesh sieve.
Allow to cool for 1 minute, then stir in lemon juice and honey.
Add a pinch of cayenne if desired and mix well.
Sip slowly, enjoying the warmth and aroma.

remedies.name: CCF Tea
remedies.description: A blend of cumin, coriander, and fennel seeds to ease digestion and bloating.
steps: Measure out all three seeds separately.
In a dry skillet over medium-low heat, lightly toast each seed type for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Combine toasted seeds in a mortar and gently crush to release oils.
Bring 3 cups of water to a rolling boil in a saucepan.
Add the crushed seeds and immediately reduce heat to the lowest setting.
Cover and simmer for exactly 7 minutes.
Remove from heat and let stand covered for 2 more minutes.
Strain into a teapot or directly into cups.
Drink warm, especially after meals.

remedies.name: Hing (Asafoetida) Water
remedies.description: Powerful remedy for bloating and abdominal discomfort.
steps: Use a precise 1/8 teaspoon measure for the hing.
Heat water to just below boiling (about 180Â°F).
In a small bowl, mix hing powder with 1 tbsp of the warm water to form a smooth paste.
Add ghee or coconut oil to the remaining water and stir well.
Slowly whisk the hing paste into the water-oil mixture until fully incorporated.
Drink immediately while warm, in small sips.
For chronic issues, take 2-3 times daily before meals for up to 1 week.

remedies.name: Warm Lemon Honey Water
remedies.description: Stimulates digestion and helps flush out excess gas.
steps: Warm the water until just hot to touch.
Slice lemon thinly and muddle in a mug to release juices.
Add warm water and let steep for 2 minutes.
Remove lemon slices.
Stir in honey until dissolved.
Drink first thing in the morning, wait 30 minutes before eating.
Rinse mouth after drinking to protect tooth enamel.

remedies.name: Shatavari Powder
remedies.description: Balances estrogen and supports reproductive health.
ingredients: 1 cup warm almond or coconut milk
steps: Warm your choice of milk until steaming but not boiling.
Mix shatavari powder and cardamom with 1 tbsp milk to make a paste.
Gradually whisk in the rest of the milk until fully incorporated.
Drink in the evening about 1 hour before bedtime.
Store any unused powder in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.

remedies.name: Ashwagandha Tea
remedies.description: Helps regulate cortisol and thyroid hormone levels.
steps: Boil water and let cool for 2 minutes to reach optimal temperature.
Mix ashwagandha and cinnamon with 1 tbsp hot water to make a paste.
Slowly add the rest of the water, stirring to avoid clumps.
Drink in the afternoon for best results.
Use a straw to drink if concerned about temporary teeth staining from herbs.

remedies.name: Flaxseed Water
remedies.description: Supports hormonal balance and menstrual regularity.
steps: Soak flaxseeds overnight.
Strain and drink the water in the morning.
benefits: Rich in lignans for hormone balance.

remedies.name: Aloe Vera Juice
remedies.description: Maintains hormonal levels and soothes PCOS symptoms.
ingredients: 2 tbsp aloe vera gel (fresh or store-bought)
steps: Blend aloe vera gel with water and honey.
Drink on an empty stomach in the morning.

remedies.name: Sesame Ladoo
remedies.description: Rich in zinc and calcium, supports female hormones.
steps: Roast sesame seeds, melt jaggery with ghee.
Mix together, form into balls.
Cool and store in airtight container.
benefits: Rich in minerals for hormone health.

remedies.name: Methi Seed Water
remedies.description: Improves insulin sensitivity and hormonal balance.
steps: Soak methi seeds overnight in water.
Drink the water and chew the seeds in the morning.

remedies.name: Hormone-Balancing Kitchari
remedies.description: Easy-to-digest meal with balancing spices for hormonal support.
steps: Wash rice and dal, heat ghee in a pot.
Add cumin, coriander, turmeric, then rice and dal.
Add water and salt, bring to boil, simmer until soft.
Serve warm.

remedies.name: Shatavari Elixir
remedies.description: Balances estrogen levels and eases PMS or menopausal discomfort.
steps: Mix shatavari powder in warm milk.
Add honey and stir well.
Drink before bedtime.

remedies.name: Flaxseed Water
remedies.description: Supports hormone balance and reduces inflammation naturally.
steps: Soak flaxseeds in water for 10 minutes.
Stir and drink the mixture.

remedies.name: Chasteberry Infusion
remedies.description: Promotes progesterone production and eases cycle-related pain.
steps: Steep chasteberry in boiling water for 7 minutes.
Strain and drink warm.

remedies.name: Evening Primrose Oil
remedies.description: Supports hormonal health and reduces breast tenderness and cramps.
steps: Take 1-2 capsules daily with food, as directed by your healthcare provider.

remedies.name: Seed Cycling Mix
remedies.description: Rotating flax, pumpkin, sesame & sunflower seeds to regulate hormones.
steps: Grind seeds fresh daily.
Eat flax and pumpkin seeds during follicular phase (days 1-14).
Eat sesame and sunflower seeds during luteal phase (days 15-28).

remedies.name: Chyawanprash Spoon
remedies.description: Classic herbal jam rich in amla and 40+ herbs to enhance energy and immunity.
steps: Take 1 tsp chyawanprash daily in the morning, plain or with warm milk.

remedies.name: Dates & Almond Shake
remedies.description: Blended dates, almonds, and warm milk for a quick energy and strength boost.
steps: Blend dates and almonds with milk until smooth.
Serve warm.

remedies.name: Moringa Tea
remedies.description: Rich in iron and vitamin C, moringa helps fight fatigue and restores vitality.
steps: Mix moringa powder in hot water.
Add honey and stir well.
Drink warm.

remedies.name: Ashwagandha Latte
remedies.description: Balances stress hormones and supports sustained energy throughout the day.
steps: Warm milk, whisk in ashwagandha and cinnamon.
Add honey and blend until frothy.
Drink warm.

remedies.name: Beetroot & Carrot Soup
remedies.description: Detoxifying soup rich in antioxidants.
steps: Heat oil, sautÃ© onion, add beetroot and carrots.
Add broth, simmer until veggies are soft.
Blend until smooth, season and serve.

remedies.name: Flaxseed & Banana Smoothie
remedies.description: Omega-3 rich smoothie for hormonal health.
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Serve chilled.

remedies.name: Turmeric Golden Milk
remedies.description: Healing drink with turmeric and almond milk.
steps: Warm almond milk, whisk in turmeric and cinnamon.
Add honey and blend until frothy.
Drink warm.

remedies.name: Dates & Nuts Ladoo
remedies.description: Natural sweet energy balls for fatigue.
steps: Blend dates and nuts, mix with ghee.
Form into balls and chill.

remedies.name: Coconut Water & Chia Fresca
remedies.description: Electrolyte-rich hydrating drink.
steps: Mix chia seeds in coconut water, let sit 5 min.
Add lemon juice and stir.

remedies.name: Fermented Rice Kanji
remedies.description: Probiotic-rich fermented rice drink.
steps: Soak cooked rice in water overnight.
Strain and drink the liquid in the morning.

remedies.name: Cumin & Coriander Tea
remedies.description: Digestive tea to reduce bloating.
steps: Boil water, add seeds, simmer 5 min.
Strain and drink warm.

remedies.name: Dark Chocolate Oats
remedies.description: Magnesium-rich breakfast for mood swings.
steps: Cook oats in milk, stir in cocoa and chocolate chips.
Serve warm.

remedies.name: Broccoli & Almond Stir-fry
remedies.description: Cruciferous veggies for estrogen balance.
steps: Heat oil, stir-fry broccoli, add almonds.
Season and serve.
benefits: Rich in fiber and vitamin E.

remedies.name: Ginger & Jaggery Tea
remedies.description: Anti-inflammatory drink for cramps.
steps: Boil ginger in water for 10 min.
Strain, add jaggery, stir to dissolve.
Drink warm.

remedies.name: Quinoa Upma
remedies.description: High-protein breakfast with quinoa and vegetables
steps: Rinse quinoa thoroughly and soak for 15 minutes.
Heat oil in a pan, add mustard and cumin seeds.
Add onions, ginger, and green chilies. SautÃ© until golden.
Add carrots and peas, cook for 3-4 minutes.
Add drained quinoa and stir for 2 minutes.
Add water and salt, bring to boil.
Cover and simmer for 15 minutes until quinoa is cooked.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot.

remedies.name: Palak Tofu Curry
remedies.description: Iron-rich spinach with protein-packed tofu
steps: Blanch spinach in boiling water for 2 minutes, then blend to a puree.
Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds.
Add onions, garlic, and ginger. SautÃ© until golden.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add spices and cook for 1 minute.
Add spinach puree and cook for 5 minutes.
Add tofu cubes and coconut milk.
Simmer for 8-10 minutes until flavors blend.
Serve hot with rice or roti.

remedies.name: Spinach & Paneer Paratha
remedies.description: Iron and calcium rich stuffed flatbread
steps: Make dough with flour, salt, and water. Rest for 15 minutes.
Mix spinach, paneer, spices, and 1 tsp oil for filling.
Divide dough into portions and roll into circles.
Place filling in center, seal edges, and roll gently.
Heat a pan and cook paratha with oil on both sides.
Press gently while cooking until golden spots appear.
Serve hot with yogurt or pickle.

remedies.name: Moong Dal Chilla
remedies.description: Protein-packed lentil pancakes with spices
steps: Soak moong dal for 2-3 hours, then grind to a smooth batter.
Add all ingredients except oil to the batter.
Mix well and adjust consistency with water.
Heat a non-stick pan and spread batter like a pancake.
Drizzle oil around edges and cook until golden.
Flip and cook the other side until crispy.
Serve hot with chutney or yogurt.

remedies.name: Chana Chaat Salad
remedies.description: Protein-packed chickpea salad with veggies
steps: Drain and rinse boiled chickpeas.
Mix chickpeas with diced vegetables.
Add mint leaves and mix gently.
Whisk together lemon juice, oil, and spices.
Pour dressing over salad and toss well.
Let it marinate for 5 minutes.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

remedies.name: Sprouted Moong Salad
remedies.description: High-protein sprouted lentils with veggies
steps: Steam sprouted moong beans for 3-4 minutes until tender.
Let them cool completely.
Mix with all chopped vegetables.
Add ginger, green chili, and coriander.
Whisk lemon juice, oil, chaat masala, and salt.
Pour dressing over salad and mix well.
Serve fresh or chill for 10 minutes.

remedies.name: Iron-Rich Palak Paratha
remedies.description: Iron and calcium rich stuffed flatbread, ideal for lunch during the menstrual phase
steps: Mix flour with spinach puree, spices, and salt.
Add water gradually to make soft dough.
Rest the dough for 20 minutes.
Divide into portions and roll into circles.
Cook on a hot pan with oil until golden spots appear.
Press gently while cooking for even cooking.
Serve hot with yogurt and pickle.

remedies.name: Quinoa & Veggie Bowl
remedies.description: Protein-packed bowl to support energy and hormone balance for ovulation dinner
ingredients: 1 cup mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, zucchini)
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Roast mixed vegetables with olive oil and herbs.
Season with salt and pepper.
Arrange quinoa in a bowl as base.
Top with roasted vegetables and chickpeas.
Add avocado slices and pumpkin seeds.
Drizzle with lemon juice and serve.

remedies.name: Methi Seed Water
remedies.description: Soaked fenugreek seeds regulate blood sugar and support hormonal balance
steps: Soak fenugreek seeds in water overnight (8-10 hours).
Strain the water in the morning.
Add honey or lemon juice if desired.
Drink on empty stomach for best results.
You can also chew the softened seeds.
Continue for 2-3 weeks for best results.

remedies.name: Ashwagandha with Warm Milk
remedies.description: Reduces cortisol and boosts stamina, great for stress and hormone support
steps: Warm the milk in a saucepan (don't boil).
Add ashwagandha powder and whisk well.
Add honey, cardamom, and cinnamon.
Stir until well combined.
Add saffron if using.
Serve warm before bedtime.
Consume regularly for 2-4 weeks.
